bibl.title: Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton, F.S.A. Volume III.

series.title: University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No.

bibl.seg: Thomas J. David (edited by), Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton, F.S.A. Volume III. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 18.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1967, 4°, xii-109 pp. et IV pll.
C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 44 (1969) No. 87, pp. 153-154. - Hélène Cadell, RPhil 3e s., 46 (1972) pp. 135-137. - P.J. Sijpesteijn, BibO 27 (1970) pp. 216-217.
